item.title: Buy x amount pi
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

In some servers, when you additem, it only adds one at a time for non-stackable items, so you’ll have to loop it if it’s not already stackable.

Wrong section btw.
